body:
Nextflix is a Netflix clone that comes with all basic functionalities Netflix offers.

Users can sign up, sign in, create, edit, delete their profile and watch a wide variety of latest TV shows as well as movies.

Nextflix uses React and Nextjs for it's javascript framework, styled-components for css style, framer-motion for animations, NextAuth for authentication and route protection.

It also utilizes MongoDb along with localStorage to save and retrieve user data.

header: What can I watch on Nextflix?
body: Due to copyright issues, you can only watch trailers of TV shows and movies.
Yes! Just click the 'trial account' button on the sign up page and it will automatically create a trial account for you!

As a self-taught front-end developer who just started a few months ago, this is a perfect side project to test what I have learned and show the abilities of what I can achieve.

I hope you like it!
